pull_request.title: Communication with web server from within Gazebo

update.description:
A UI plugin to log in the server [RestUiPlugin]
A server plugin to send messages to the web server [RestWebPlugin]
A a test world [rest_web.world].

A test web server with testing instruction can be found in:
	test/plugins/rest-web/readme.txt

The largest file is RestApi.cc, which is mostly the libcurl code (adapted from their C examples)
update.title: Communication with web server from within Gazebo

content.raw:
compile error here:

~~~
/home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo8/plugins/events/InRegionEventSource.cc: In member function ‘void gazebo::InRegionEventSource::Info()’:
/home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo8/plugins/events/InRegionEventSource.cc:82:9: error: expected primary-expression before ‘<<’ token
         << " model " << this->modelName << "  region [" << this->regionName
         ^
make[2]: *** [plugins/events/CMakeFiles/SimEventsPlugin.dir/InRegionEventSource.cc.o] Error 1
~~~
content.html:
compile error here:

/home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo8/plugins/events/InRegionEventSource.cc: In member function ‘void gazebo::InRegionEventSource::Info()’:
/home/ian/depot/clones/gazebo8/plugins/events/InRegionEventSource.cc:82:9: error: expected primary-expression before ‘<<’ token
         << " model " << this->modelName << "  region [" << this->regionName
         ^
make[2]: *** [plugins/events/CMakeFiles/SimEventsPlugin.dir/InRegionEventSource.cc.o] Error 1
